info.name: Compass Scholarship Program Management System
info.description: The Compass Scholarship Program Management System is a comprehensive solution to manage various aspects of a Scholarship Program environment. From creating classes and managing instructors to organizing students into squads, this system aims to simplify administrative tasks and foster better communication among stakeholders
